mapper.select: SELECT elder_level_history_code, elder_id, elder_name, center_code, center_name, elder_service_approval_level, elder_service_approval_category, elder_service_approval_category2, elder_sercvice_apply_date, elder_service_approval_start_date, elder_service_approval_end_date, elder_service_approval_number FROM elder_level_history WHERE elder_id = #{elderId} ORDER BY elder_sercvice_apply_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO elder_level_history (elder_level_history_code, elder_id, elder_name, center_code, center_name, elder_service_approval_level, elder_service_approval_category, elder_service_approval_category2, elder_sercvice_apply_date, elder_service_approval_start_date, elder_service_approval_end_date, elder_service_approval_number) VALUES (#{elderLevelHistoryCode}, #{elderId}, #{elderName}, #{centerCode}, #{centerName}, #{elderServiceApprovalLevel}, #{elderServiceApprovalCategory}, #{elderServiceApprovalCategory2}, #{elderSercviceApplyDate}, #{elderServiceApprovalStartDate}, #{elderServiceApprovalEndDate}, #{elderServiceApprovalNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM elder_level_history WHERE elder_service_approval_end_date = (select MAX(elder_service_approval_end_date) FROM elder_level_history WHERE elder_id = #{elderId}) AND elder_id = #{elderId};
